channel.title: Crossbone Gundam X1 on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Crossbone Gundam X1 on John Cosio

item.title: Build Complete: SD Gundam Cross Silhouette Crossbone Gundam X1
item.description: Here we go again with one of the last SD kits I’m building. Would want to do some bigger and cooler kits but we’ll see. Funding is a big constraint, the prices of model kits here are expensive as hell. It’s like they replaced the Yen with Pesos but same currency or more. Maybe I can get one every payday. Maybe…. or more…. Anyway we have this Gundam Crossbones. He looks like a pirate, I’m not familiar with the story but he sure looks cool.
